publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1923 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Clean-Up of Contaminated Land—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to initiate an immediate survey of all land surrounding Scotland’s nuclear facilities, to make an announcement to the Parliament regarding how the land surrounding Hunterston is to be cleaned up and, in light of the contamination at Hunterston, to demand the immediate closure of all nuclear facilities in Scotland.

S2M-1923 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Clean-Up of Contaminated Land—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to initiate an immediate survey of all land surrounding Scotland’s nuclear facilities, to make an announcement to the Parliament regarding how the land surrounding Hunterston is to be cleaned up and, in light of the contamination at Hunterston, to demand the immediate closure of all nuclear facilities in Scotland.
S2M-1923 Clean-Up of Contaminated Land (lodged on 1 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
